Maxteabag/sqlit

Terminal interface for SQL databases

Related repos

  • SQL IDE for the terminal with support for DuckDB, SQLite, and more
  • Universal command-line interface for SQL databases
  • SQL client for Linux systems
  • terminal SQL client with tabs and vim keys
  • terminal UI for browsing and editing SQLite and CSV databases
  • SQL agent with self-correction and visualization
  • PHP database framework for SQL integration
  • Browser-based SQL database manager
